# list with GOFIPS140=off
env GOFIPS140=off
go list -f '{{.DefaultGODEBUG}}'
! stdout fips140

# list with GOFIPS140=latest
env GOFIPS140=latest
go list -f '{{.DefaultGODEBUG}}'
stdout fips140=on

[short] skip

# build with GOFIPS140=off is cached
env GOFIPS140=off
go build -x -o x.exe
! stderr .-fipso
go build -x -o x.exe
! stderr link

# build with GOFIPS140=latest is NOT cached (need fipso)
env GOFIPS140=latest
go build -x -o x.exe
stderr link.*-fipso
go build -x -o x.exe
stderr link.*-fipso

# build test with GOFIPS140=off is cached
env GOFIPS140=off
go test -x -c
! stderr .-fipso
go test -x -c
! stderr link

# build test with GOFIPS140=latest is cached
env GOFIPS140=latest
go test -x -c
stderr link.*-fipso
go test -x -c
! stderr link



-- go.mod --
module m
-- x.go --
package main
import _ "crypto/sha256"
func main() {
}
-- x_test.go --
package main
import "testing"
func Test(t *testing.T) {}
